Class AdminService

java.lang.Object
application.AdminService
public class AdminService extends Object
Provides services and business logic related to administrators in the library system.

This class acts as a bridge between the persistence layer (AdminRepository) and the presentation/application layers. It manages admin registration, removal, authentication, session status (login/logout), and loading admins from external sources.

All operations that involve verifying credentials or updating admin status are encapsulated here to maintain separation of concerns and support testability.

      Returns:
      the AdminRepository

    • findAdminByEmail

      public Admin findAdminByEmail(String username)
      Finds an administrator by their username/email.
      Parameters:
      username - the username/email to search for
      Returns:
      the Admin object if found, null otherwise

    • login

      public boolean login(String userName, String password)
      Logs in an administrator by verifying credentials. Updates the admin's status to ONLINE if successful.
      Parameters:
      userName - the admin's username
      password - the admin's password
      Returns:
      true if login is successful, false otherwise

    • logout

      public void logout(String username)
      Logs out an administrator and updates their status to OFFLINE.
      Parameters:
      username - the admin's username

    • loadAdmins

      public void loadAdmins(AdminSourceLoader loader)
      Loads administrators from an external source and registers them in the repository.
      Parameters:
      loader - an implementation of AdminSourceLoader to provide admin data
